#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int a[1000011];
int s[4*1000011];
void make(int l, int r, int node){
	if(l==r) s[node]=a[l];
	else{
		int mid=l+r; mid/=2;
		make(l,mid,2*node); make(mid+1,r,2*node+1);
		s[node]=min(s[2*node],s[1+2*node]);
	}
}
int query(int start, int end, int node, int l, int r){
	if(start>r || end<l) return 1e9 + 7;
	if(start>=l && end<=r) return s[node];
	int mid=start+end; mid/=2;
	return min(query(start,mid,2*node,l,r),query(mid+1,end,2*node+1,l,r));
}
int main(){
	int n,q; cin>>n>>q;
	for(int i=1; i<=n; i++) cin>>a[i];	
	make(1,n,1);
	while(q--){
		int l,r; cin>>l>>r;
		cout<<query(1,n,1,l,r);
		cout<<endl;
	}
}
